id.title: Layanan Virtual Assistant
id.description: Sebagai Virtual Assistant, saya menawarkan berbagai layanan untuk membantu mengoptimalkan operasional bisnis Anda. Dari manajemen media sosial hingga administrasi, setiap layanan dirancang untuk memberikan solusi yang efisien dan berkualitas.

services.title: Manajemen Media Sosial
services.description: Pengelolaan akun media sosial bisnis Anda, termasuk pembuatan konten, penjadwalan post, dan interaksi dengan audiens.

services.title: Data Entry & Administrasi
services.description: Pengelolaan data, input informasi, pembuatan laporan, dan tugas administratif lainnya dengan teliti dan efisien.

services.title: Desain Konten Digital
services.description: Pembuatan konten visual menarik untuk media sosial, website, dan materi marketing menggunakan tools profesional.

services.title: Riset & Analisis
services.description: Penelitian pasar, analisis kompetitor, dan pengumpulan data untuk mendukung pengambilan keputusan bisnis Anda.

services.title: Customer Service
services.description: Penanganan pertanyaan pelanggan, manajemen pesanan, dan dukungan after-sales dengan responsif dan profesional.

services.title: Manajemen Marketplace
services.description: Pengelolaan toko online di berbagai platform marketplace, termasuk update produk, monitoring stok, dan optimasi listing.

en.title: Virtual Assistant Services
en.description: As a Virtual Assistant, I offer various services to help optimize your business operations. From social media management to administration, each service is designed to provide efficient and quality solutions.

services.title: Social Media Management
services.description: Management of your business social media accounts, including content creation, post scheduling, and audience interaction.

services.title: Data Entry & Administration
services.description: Data management, information input, report creation, and other administrative tasks with precision and efficiency.

services.title: Digital Content Design
services.description: Creation of engaging visual content for social media, websites, and marketing materials using professional tools.

services.title: Research & Analysis
services.description: Market research, competitor analysis, and data collection to support your business decision-making.

services.title: Customer Service
services.description: Handling customer inquiries, order management, and after-sales support with responsiveness and professionalism.

services.title: Marketplace Management
services.description: Management of online stores across various marketplace platforms, including product updates, stock monitoring, and listing optimization.
